nodes.text: A Fortune For The Taking is an adventure seed contained in the Star Wars Gamemaster Screen. A group of spacers come across a new world where they help a member of the planet's native species. In gratitude, they reward the spacers with sacks of hezar stones worth thousands of Galactic Credit Standards. The spacers are left with the dilemma of becoming exceedingly wealth at the cost of the species' peaceful existence. Possible alternate storylines that could be adapted by a gamemaster were also included. It was written by Bill Olmesdahl.
